properties.entry: SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM(SELECT MEMBER_NO , MEMBER_ID , MEMBER_NAME , DOG_NO , DOG_NAME , MEMBER_EMAIL , MEMBER_PHONE FROM MEMBER LEFT JOIN DOG USING(MEMBER_NO) ORDER BY MEMBER_NO DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM MEMBER WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
